pr_title: Do not use Spring Boot component scan for creating beans

timeline.message:
Do not use Spring Boot component scan for creating beans

The file based registry, the Mongo DB registry and the Device Connection
service now create service bean instances explicitly in a central place
which makes it easier to understand what's actually
happening.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText: You can leave out the value =  part, as this is the default name and can be omitted.
timeline.author: ctron
